amendment.description: To strike the section specifically authorizing intelligence and intelligence-related activities.

action.text: Proposed amendment SA 4906 withdrawn in Senate.
Amendment SA 4906 proposed by Senator Rockefeller. (consideration: CR S9068; text: CR S9068) To strike the section specifically authorizing intelligence and intelligence-related activities.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 4906 proposed by Senator Rockefeller.
